name: Rainbow Blocks Lite
description:
Rainbow Blocks is a block-sliding game similar to JT's Blocks or SameGame.

The object of the game is to clear the board by removing groups of blocks of the same colour.

The more blocks you clear in a single move, the higher your score and the further you can progress in the game.

------------

The Rainbow Blocks LITE version is limited to a single difficulty level and high scores are disabled. Upgrade to the full version to unlock these features.
